title: Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted
OB: When a report scalar parameter is deleted from a library file and the library file is referenced in a report design, the icon of the parameter in the data explorer view of the report design remains unchanged, even though the parameter no longer exists in the library file.
EB: The icon of a report scalar parameter should be updated to indicate that it is invalid or does not exist when the parameter is deleted from the library file that is referenced in the report design.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a report scalar parameter in a library file. 
2. Create a report design and use the above library file. 
3. In the library explorer, pull the parameter to the data explorer view of the report. 
4. Open the library file and delete the parameter. 
5. Reopen the report design file and observe that the icon of the parameter in the data explorer view remains unchanged.
